title: Is it possible to be any unluckier

replies.body: It's unlucky price wise. When you only get one 70% off and it happens to be for a 520 skin.
I got 70% off Golden Alistar. A 390RP skin haha.

I see.. feelsbadman.

Mine is Panda Annie 975RP. Quite an ok skin
Yeah that's nice! :) I have the Panda one.. while I was going through my Japanese fangirl stage.

My 70% is Headhunter Nidalee, i already own 3 nidalee skins (french maid, warring kingdoms and challenger), all of which are better than Headhunter.

Mind you i also got 3 skins which i bought outright because they seemed actually characterized towards my top champs and were skins for champions that i play a lot.

Unlucky! 
I actually got super lucky with mine...
I got 70% off project Lucian and 60% off Cosmic Kass, inwhich I bought both of them, so thanks riot!
I also got...
Pool party Ziggs for 20% off
Dragonslayer Braum for 40% off
Project Fiora for 50% off
and Steel Legion lux for 50% off...

Not so bad eh?
i got free project {{champion:11}}  from hextech ty rito {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

40% off gangster twitch (terrible skin)
30% off soulreaver draven (already have primetime)
40% off steel legion lux (free star guardian from hextech unlocked)
50% off popstar ahri (might buy it lvl 5 ahri)
40% off project zed (my cancerous old main) and
70% off warring kingdoms xin zhao...
my 70% sandstorm ekko > {{summoner:14}}
Oh wow you got some top shit man, grats! i did get lucky once it was either the last time it was available or the time before that i got 70% off firefighter tristana.
Not sure if this is normal, but i uh...got three 70% off skins...

Reaper Soraka for 20% off normally 1350 RP (Bought outright) (Halloween Legacy Skin)
Academy Ahri for 50% off normally 750 RP (Will get it most likely (Have Challenger but like this one))
Sanguine Garen for 60% off normally 520 RP (won't get it (Have Steel Legion))
Freljord Ashe for 60% off normally 520 RP (Will get it most likely (Have Sherwood and Queen)) (Legacy Skin)
Panda Annie for 60% off normally 975 RP (Will get it most likely (Have Reverse))
Viridian Kayle for 70% off normally 520 RP (might get because of price (have riot))
lumberjack sion.. feelsbadman, but i got riot blitzcrank at 50% off so it evens out
I didn't even get a 70% off, there was no guarantee that you would get one, so don't feel too bad
